minecraft:attribute_modifiers.description: Contains attribute modifiers on this item which modify attributes of the wearer or holder.

type.description: The name of the attribute this modifier is to act upon.

slot.description: Slot or slot type the item must be in for the modifier to take effect.

id.description: The unique resource location to identify this modifier.

amount.description: Amount of change from the modifier.

operation.description: Modifier operation. See Attribute Modifiers for info.

minecraft:banner_patterns.description: List of all patterns applied to the banner or the shield.

pattern.description: One banner pattern (an ID or a new banner pattern definition).

asset_id.description: The resource location for the texture asset.

translation_key.description: The translation key for displaying the banner tooltip.

minecraft:base_color.description: The base dye color of the banner applied on a shield. Example: /give @s shield[base_color="lime"]

minecraft:bees.description: The entities currently in the beehive or bee nest.

items.description: A single entity in the hive.

entity_data.description: The NBT data of the entity in the hive. See Entity format.

min_ticks_in_hive.description: The minimum amount of time in ticks for this entity to stay in the hive.

ticks_in_hive.description: The amount of ticks the entity has stayed in the hive.

minecraft:block_entity_data.description: Block entity NBT applied when this block is placed. See Block entity format. Excludes x, y and z tags.

minecraft:block_state.description: The block state properties to apply when placing this block. Each key is a block state key and its value is the desired state value.

minecraft:blocks_attacks.description: When present, this item can be used like a shield to block attacks to the holding player.

block_delay_seconds.description: Time (in seconds) that use must be held before successfully blocking attacks.

disable_cooldown_scale.description: Multiplier for cooldown time when attacked by a disabling attack. If 0, item can't be disabled.

damage_reductions.description: Controls how much damage should be blocked in a given attack.

type.description: Damage type(s) (ID, tag with #, or list of string IDs).

base.description: Constant amount of damage to block.

factor.description: Fraction of dealt damage to block.

horizontal_blocking_angle.description: Maximum angle between user's facing direction and attack direction for blocking.

item_damage.description: Controls how much damage is applied to the item from a given attack.

threshold.description: Minimum damage required before applying item damage.

base.description: Base damage applied to item if threshold is passed.

factor.description: Fraction of dealt damage applied to item if threshold is passed.

block_sound.description: Sound played when an attack is successfully blocked.

oneOf.description: Sound event definition.

disabled_sound.description: Sound played when the item goes into disabled cooldown due to an attack.

oneOf.description: Sound event definition.

bypassed_by.description: A damage type tag with # of damage types that bypass blocking. Defaults to none.

minecraft:break_sound.description: Sound event to play when the item breaks due to zero durability.

oneOf.description: A sound event ID.
A sound event definition object.

minecraft:bucket_entity_data.description: NBT applied to an entity when placed from this bucket. Only specific tags are supported.

HuntingCooldown.description: Memory module cooldown for axolotls (in ticks).

BucketVariantTag.description: Maps to Variant tag for tropical fish.

type.description: Maps to type tag for salmon.

minecraft:bundle_contents.description: The items stored inside this bundle.

minecraft:can_break.title: Can Break Block Predicates
minecraft:can_break.description: The only blocks this item may break when used by a player in adventure mode. Can be a single block predicate or a list of them.

items.title: Block Predicate
items.description: A single block predicate describing blocks the item can break.

blocks.title: Blocks
blocks.description: A block ID (e.g. 'minecraft:stone'), a block tag prefixed with '#' (e.g. '#minecraft:logs'), or a list of such strings.

nbt.title: NBT
nbt.description: Optional NBT string representing the block entity data to match.

state.title: Block State
state.description: An object containing block state key-value pairs to match, e.g., { "facing": "east" }.

minecraft:can_place_on.title: Can Place On Block Predicates
minecraft:can_place_on.description: Determines which blocks this item can be placed on in adventure mode. Can be a single block predicate object or an array of such objects.

items.title: Block Predicate
items.description: A predicate defining a set of block conditions this item can be placed on.

blocks.title: Blocks
blocks.description: A block ID (e.g., 'minecraft:stone'), a tag with '#' (e.g., '#minecraft:logs'), or a list of such strings.

nbt.title: NBT
nbt.description: Optional NBT data to match block entity properties.

state.title: Block State
state.description: An object specifying required block state key-value pairs (e.g., { "facing": "north" }).

minecraft:charged_projectiles.title: Charged Projectiles
minecraft:charged_projectiles.description: A list of item stacks representing the projectiles loaded into this crossbow.

minecraft:consumable.title: Consumable Component
minecraft:consumable.description: Specifies consumption properties and effects for this item.

consume_seconds.title: Consume Time
consume_seconds.description: Number of seconds required to consume the item. Defaults to 1.6.

animation.title: Consume Animation
animation.description: Animation used while consuming. Must be one of: none, eat, drink, block, bow, spear, crossbow, spyglass, toot_horn, brush. Defaults to eat.

sound.title: Consume Sound
sound.description: Sound event used during and after consumption. Can be a string sound ID or a sound object definition.

id.title: Sound ID
id.description: The identifier of the sound event.

has_consume_particles.title: Has Consume Particles
has_consume_particles.description: Whether particles are emitted while consuming. Defaults to true.

on_consume_effects.title: On Consume Effects
on_consume_effects.description: A list of effects that occur when the item is consumed.

minecraft:container.title: Container Items
minecraft:container.description: List of item entries representing contents of the container.

items.title: Container Slot
items.description: A single slot entry within the container.

slot.title: Slot Index
slot.description: The index of the slot in the container (0â€“255).

item.title: Item Stack
item.description: The item stored in this slot.

minecraft:container_loot.title: Container Loot
minecraft:container_loot.description: Specifies the unresolved loot table and optional seed for the container.

loot_table.title: Loot Table ID
loot_table.description: The identifier of the loot table used to generate container contents.

seed.title: Loot Table Seed
seed.description: A pseudorandom seed to resolve the loot table with. If not specified or 0, a random seed is used by the game.

minecraft:custom_data.title: Custom Data
minecraft:custom_data.description: A compound of arbitrary key-value pairs defined by the user. Can be any valid JSON structure or string SNBT.

minecraft:custom_model_data.title: Custom Model Data
minecraft:custom_model_data.description: A compound containing lists of values used by different model selectors.

floats.title: Floats
floats.description: List of float values used by range_dispatch model types. Missing values fall back to default models.

flags.title: Flags
flags.description: Byte array interpreted as booleans for the condition model type. Missing values return the 'is_false' model.

strings.title: Strings
strings.description: List of string selectors for the select model type. Missing values use the fallback model.

colors.title: Colors
colors.description: List of RGB color values for tinting. Each entry can be an int (decimal or hex) or a list of 3 floats (converted to int).

oneOf.title: Color as Integer
oneOf.description: An RGB color packed into a single integer using the formula: Red<<16 + Green<<8 + Blue.

oneOf.title: Color as RGB Floats
oneOf.description: List of 3 floats between 0 and 1 representing red, green, and blue.

minecraft:custom_name.title: Custom Name
minecraft:custom_name.description: The item's display name in Text Component format. Can be a string (JSON text component as string), a JSON object, or a list of JSON objects for complex formatting.

oneOf.title: Text Component as String
oneOf.description: A JSON-formatted string representing the item's custom name.

oneOf.title: Text Component as Object
oneOf.description: A single text component object representing the item's custom name.

oneOf.title: Text Component as Array
oneOf.description: An array of text component objects for a richly formatted name.

minecraft:damage.title: Damage
minecraft:damage.description: The number of durability uses consumed by the item. Must be a non-negative integer. Defaults to 0 if unspecified.

minecraft:damage_resistant.title: Damage Resistant Types
minecraft:damage_resistant.description: A tag listing damage types (prefixed with #) to which the item is invulnerable, both in entity form and when equipped.

types.title: Damage Types
types.description: A damage type tag, starting with '#', representing the set of damage types this item resists.

minecraft:debug_stick_state.title: Debug Stick Selected Block States
minecraft:debug_stick_state.description: A compound mapping block IDs to block state values that the debug stick will edit.

additionalProperties.title: Block State Value
additionalProperties.description: The block state value for the corresponding block ID property.

minecraft:death_protection.title: Death Protection Component
minecraft:death_protection.description: If present, this item protects the holder from dying by restoring a single health point

death_effects.title: Death Effects
death_effects.description: A list of consume effects that are applied when the item protects the holder

minecraft:dyed_color.title: Dyed Color Component
minecraft:dyed_color.description: Defines the color of this leather armor piece. The color applied of this leather armor or wolf armor item. More generally, it is used as the minecraft:dye color provider in item model definitions.

oneOf.title: Color as Integer
oneOf.description: Color codes are the hex code of the color converted to a decimal number, or can be calculated from the red, green and blue components using this formula: Red<<16 + Green<<8 + Blue

oneOf.title: Color as RGB Array
oneOf.description: A list containing 3 floats corresponding to red, green and blue values as a fraction (ranged 0 to 1, inclusive) that is automatically converted to the int format

minecraft:enchantable.title: Enchantable Component
minecraft:enchantable.description: Defines whether the item can be enchanted in an enchanting table. This only applies if there are applicable enchantments available for that item. If present, and applicable enchantments are available, items with the component can be enchanted in an enchanting table.

value.title: Enchantability Value
value.description: Positive integer representing the item's enchantability. A higher value allows enchantments with a higher cost to be picked.

minecraft:enchantment_glint_override.title: Enchantment Glint Override Component
minecraft:enchantment_glint_override.description: Overrides the enchantment glint effect on this item. When true, this item displays a glint, even without enchantments. When false, this item does not display a glint, even with enchantments.

minecraft:enchantments.title: Enchantments Component
minecraft:enchantments.description: Specifies the enchantments on this item. Contains key-value pairs of levels of enchantments on this item that affect the way the item works.

^[a-z0-9_.-]+:[a-z0-9_.-]+$.title: Enchantment Level
^[a-z0-9_.-]+:[a-z0-9_.-]+$.description: The level of the enchantment, where the key is the resource location of an enchantment.

minecraft:entity_data.title: Entity Data Component
minecraft:entity_data.description: Specifies the NBT data of an entity that is spawned/created from this item (e.g. armor stand, spawn egg, etc). NBT applied to an entity when created from an item.

minecraft:equippable.title: Equippable Component
minecraft:equippable.description: If present, this item can be equipped in the specified slot.

slot.title: Equipment Slot
slot.description: The slot to put the item on

equip_sound.title: Equip Sound
equip_sound.description: One sound event (an ID, or a new sound event definition) to play when the item is equipped. Defaults to item.armor.equip_generic.

asset_id.title: Asset ID
asset_id.description: The resource location of the equipment model to use when equipped. The directory this refers to is assets/<namespace>/equipment/<id>.json. If not specified, falls back to rendering as the item itself when in the head slot (if not applicable, the item does not render).

allowed_entities.title: Allowed Entities
allowed_entities.description: Entity ID and or Entity Size, Entity Tag, or list of Entity IDs to limit which entities can equip this item. Defaults to all entities.

dispensable.title: Dispensable
dispensable.description: Whether the item can be dispensed by using a dispenser. Defaults to true.

swappable.title: Swappable
swappable.description: Whether the item can be equipped into the relevant slot by right-clicking. Defaults to true.

damage_on_hurt.title: Damage On Hurt
damage_on_hurt.description: Whether this item is damaged when the wearing entity is damaged. Defaults to true.

equip_on_interact.title: Equip On Interact
equip_on_interact.description: Whether this item can be equipped onto a target mob by pressing use on it (as long as this item can be equipped on the target at all). Defaults to true.

camera_overlay.title: Camera Overlay
camera_overlay.description: The resource location of the overlay texture to use when equipped. The directory this refers to is assets/<namespace>/textures/<id>.

minecraft:firework_explosion.title: Firework Explosion Component
minecraft:firework_explosion.description: The firework explosion effect stored inside of this firework star (not a firework rocket. For that see the fireworks component). The explosion effect stored by this firework star.

colors.title: Colors
colors.description: The colors of the initial particles of the explosion, randomly selected from

items.title: Color
items.description: A color as a packed integer

fade_colors.title: Fade Colors
fade_colors.description: The colors of the fading particles of the explosion, randomly selected from

items.title: Fade Color
items.description: A color as a packed integer

has_trail.title: Has Trail
has_trail.description: Whether or not the explosion has a trail effect (diamond)

has_twinkle.title: Has Twinkle
has_twinkle.description: Whether or not the explosion has a twinkle effect (glowstone dust)

minecraft:fireworks.title: Fireworks Component
minecraft:fireworks.description: The firework explosion effects stored inside of this firework rocket (not a firework star, for that see the firework_explosion component).

explosions.title: Explosions
explosions.description: List of the explosion effects caused by this firework rocket. Has a maximum of 256 explosions.

colors.title: Colors
colors.description: The colors of the initial particles of the explosion, randomly selected from

items.title: Color
items.description: A color as a packed integer

fade_colors.title: Fade Colors
fade_colors.description: The colors of the fading particles of the explosion, randomly selected from

items.title: Fade Color
items.description: A color as a packed integer

has_trail.title: Has Trail
has_trail.description: Whether or not the explosion has a trail effect (diamond)

has_twinkle.title: Has Twinkle
has_twinkle.description: Whether or not the explosion has a twinkle effect (glowstone dust)

flight_duration.title: Flight Duration
flight_duration.description: The flight duration of this firework rocket, i.e. the number of gunpowders used to craft it. Must be an integer between -128 and 127. Defaults to 1.

minecraft:food.title: Minecraft Food Component
minecraft:food.description: The food stats for this consumable item. Has no effect unless the item can be consumed (i.e. the item has the consumable component)

nutrition.title: Nutrition
nutrition.description: The number of food points restored by this item when eaten. Must be a non-negative integer

saturation.title: Saturation
saturation.description: The amount of saturation restored by this item when eaten

can_always_eat.title: Can Always Eat
can_always_eat.description: If true, this item can be eaten even if the player is not hungry. Defaults to false

minecraft:glider.title: Minecraft Glider Component
minecraft:glider.description: If present, this item allows players to glide (as with elytra) when equipped

minecraft:instrument.title: Minecraft Instrument Component
minecraft:instrument.description: Specifies the instrument of a goat horn. One instrument (an ID, or a new instrument definition)

oneOf.title: Instrument ID
oneOf.description: String ID of an existing instrument

oneOf.title: Instrument Definition
oneOf.description: New instrument definition

description.title: Description
description.description: A text component that is used as a description in tooltips

sound_event.title: Sound Event
sound_event.description: One sound event (an ID, or a new sound event definition)

oneOf.title: Sound Event ID
oneOf.description: String ID of an existing sound event

oneOf.title: Sound Event Definition
oneOf.description: New sound event definition

use_duration.title: Use Duration
use_duration.description: A non-negative float for how long the use duration is

range.title: Range
range.description: A non-negative float for the range of the sound

minecraft:intangible_projectile.title: Minecraft Intangible Projectile Component
minecraft:intangible_projectile.description: If set, this projectile item can't be picked up by a player when fired, except in creative mode. Can only be used within charged_projectiles components

minecraft:item_model.title: Minecraft Item Model Component
minecraft:item_model.description: Defines the item model of this item. The resource location of the item, which references the item model definition /assets/<namespace>/items/<id> without the .json suffix

minecraft:item_name.title: Minecraft Item Name Component
minecraft:item_name.description: The default name of this item, as a text component. Unlike the custom_name component, this name cannot be erased using an anvil, is not italicized, and does not appear in some labels, such as banner markers and item frames

oneOf.title: Simple Text
oneOf.description: Simple string text component

oneOf.title: Text Component Array
oneOf.description: Array of text components

oneOf.title: Text Component Object
oneOf.description: Text component object

minecraft:jukebox_playable.title: Minecraft Jukebox Playable Component
minecraft:jukebox_playable.description: One jukebox song (an ID) to play when inserted into a jukebox. Presence of this component allows the item can be inserted into a jukebox to play the specified song

minecraft:lock.title: Minecraft Lock Component
minecraft:lock.description: Locks a container to a certain "key". The "key" must be an item with the same data as the container item's lock. An item predicate representing the "key" to open this container item

minecraft:lodestone_tracker.title: Minecraft Lodestone Tracker Component
minecraft:lodestone_tracker.description: If specified, stores information about the lodestone this compass should point toward

target.title: Target
target.description: Information about the lodestone. Optional. If not set, this compass spins randomly

pos.title: Position
pos.description: The integer coordinates of the lodestone

dimension.title: Dimension
dimension.description: The ID of the dimension of the lodestone

tracked.title: Tracked
tracked.description: If true, the component is removed when the lodestone is broken. If false, the component is kept. Defaults to true

minecraft:lore.title: Minecraft Lore Component
minecraft:lore.description: Specifies the item's lore - that being the description of an item. List of additional lines to display in this item's tooltip. Has a maximum of 256 lines

items.title: Lore Line
items.description: Text component representing a line of text

oneOf.title: Simple Text
oneOf.description: Simple string text component

oneOf.title: Text Component Array
oneOf.description: Array of text components

oneOf.title: Text Component Object
oneOf.description: Text component object

minecraft:map_color.title: Minecraft Map Color Component
minecraft:map_color.description: Defines the color of the markings on the item of this map (not the actual map when viewed). The color of the markings on this filled map item texture

minecraft:map_decorations.title: Minecraft Map Decorations Component
minecraft:map_decorations.description: Contains the icons that are displayed on this filled map (e.g. the structures on an explorer map). Contains key-value pairs of the icons to display on this filled map

^.*$.title: Map Decoration
^.*$.description: The key-value pair of a single icon, where the key is an arbitrary unique string identifying the decoration

x.title: X Coordinate
x.description: The X world coordinate of the decoration

z.title: Z Coordinate
z.description: The Z world coordinate of the decoration

rotation.title: Rotation
rotation.description: The rotation of the icon, ranging from 0.0 to 360.0, rotated clockwise from north in degrees

minecraft:map_id.title: Minecraft Map ID Component
minecraft:map_id.description: The id of the map to show. Maps are stored in .minecraft\saves\<world_name>\data and have file names such as map_1.dat. The number of this filled map, representing the shared state holding map contents and markers

minecraft:max_damage.title: Minecraft Max Damage Component
minecraft:max_damage.description: The maximum amount of damage that this item can take. If not set, this item cannot take damage. Must be a positive integer. Cannot be combined with max_stack_size if it has a value greater than 1 (if the item can be stacked). For the durability bar to appear, the damage component must have a value

minecraft:max_stack_size.title: Minecraft Max Stack Size Component
minecraft:max_stack_size.description: The maximum number of items that can fit in a stack. Must be a positive integer between 1 and 99 (inclusive). If it has a value greater than 1 (if the item can be stacked), cannot be combined with max_damage

minecraft:note_block_sound.title: Minecraft Note Block Sound Component
minecraft:note_block_sound.description: The ID of the sound event played by a note block when this player head is placed above

minecraft:ominous_bottle_amplifier.title: Minecraft Ominous Bottle Amplifier Component
minecraft:ominous_bottle_amplifier.description: The amplifier amount of the Bad Omen effect on this ominous bottle. Must be a positive integer between 0 and 4 (inclusive)

minecraft:pot_decorations.title: Minecraft Pot Decorations Component
minecraft:pot_decorations.description: Defines the sherds applied on a decorated pot. A list of the sherds applied on each face of this decorated pot. If the list has less than 4 entries, the remaining ones default to "minecraft:brick"

items.title: Decoration Item
items.description: The ID of an item. Can be either brick or a sherd

minecraft:potion_contents.title: Minecraft Potion Contents Component
minecraft:potion_contents.description: The potion and custom effects contained in this potion, splash potion, lingering potion, or tipped arrow

oneOf.title: Potion ID
oneOf.description: The ID of a potion type

oneOf.title: Potion Contents Object
oneOf.description: Detailed potion contents with custom effects and properties

potion.title: Potion
potion.description: The ID of a potion type. Optional

custom_color.title: Custom Color
custom_color.description: The overriding color of this potion texture, and/or the particles of the area effect cloud created

custom_name.title: Custom Name
custom_name.description: An optional string used to generate containing stack name. The game uses the translation key item.minecraft.<item type>.effect.<value>. This name has a higher priority than the minecraft:item_name component, but lower than the minecraft:custom_name component

custom_effects.title: Custom Effects
custom_effects.description: A list of the additional effects that this item should apply

amplifier.title: Amplifier
amplifier.description: The amplifier of the effect, with level I having value 0. Optional, defaults to 0

duration.title: Duration
duration.description: The duration of the effect in ticks. Value -1 is treated as infinity. Values 0 or less than -2 are treated as 1. Optional, defaults to 1 tick

ambient.title: Ambient
ambient.description: Whether or not this is an effect provided by a beacon and therefore should be less intrusive on the screen. Optional, defaults to false

show_particles.title: Show Particles
show_particles.description: Whether or not this effect produces particles. Optional, defaults to true

show_icon.title: Show Icon
show_icon.description: Whether or not an icon should be shown for this effect. Optional, defaults to true

minecraft:potion_duration_scale.title: Minecraft Potion Duration Scale Component
minecraft:potion_duration_scale.description: When present, for items that have the minecraft:potion_contents component, the duration of the applied effects is scaled by this factor. Defaults to 1.0

minecraft:profile.title: Minecraft Profile Component
minecraft:profile.description: Information about the owner of this player head

oneOf.title: Player Name
oneOf.description: The name of a player profile, i.e. its username

oneOf.title: Profile Object
oneOf.description: Detailed profile information with name, ID, and properties

name.title: Name
name.description: The name of a player profile, i.e. its username. If this is the only tag provided, it resolves into the other ones below. Optional

id.title: ID
id.description: The UUID of the owner. Used to update the other tags when the chunk loads or the holder logs in, in case the owner's name has changed. Optional

name.title: Property Name
name.description: The name of the property. Can be textures

value.title: Value
value.description: The texture data json, encoded in base64

signature.title: Signature
signature.description: Optional. Mojang's signature of the value, encoded in base64

minecraft:provides_banner_patterns.title: Banner Pattern Tag
minecraft:provides_banner_patterns.description: When present, this item can be placed in the pattern slot of a loom and provides the specified banner pattern tag. Must be a tag prefixed with #.

minecraft:provides_trim_material.title: Trim Material
minecraft:provides_trim_material.description: When present, this item provides the specified trim material when used in a trimming recipe.

minecraft:rarity.title: Item Rarity
minecraft:rarity.description: Sets the rarity of this item, which affects the default color of its name. Can be common, uncommon, rare or epic.

minecraft:recipes.title: Recipe List
minecraft:recipes.description: The recipes that a player unlocks when this knowledge book is used.

minecraft:repairable.title: Repairable Configuration
minecraft:repairable.description: Allows the item to be repaired, if damageable, in an anvil using the specified ingredient.

items.title: Repair Items
items.description: Item, list of Items, or hash-prefixed Item Tag matching what can be used to repair this item.

minecraft:repair_cost.title: Repair Cost
minecraft:repair_cost.description: The number of experience levels to add to the base level cost when repairing, combining, or renaming this item with an anvil. Must be a non-negative integer, defaults to 0.

minecraft:stored_enchantments.title: Stored Enchantments
minecraft:stored_enchantments.description: Contains key-value pairs of levels of enchantments stored on this enchanted book.

.*.title: Enchantment Level
.*.description: A single key-value pair, where the key is the resource location of an enchantment, and the value is the level.

minecraft:suspicious_stew_effects.title: Suspicious Stew Effects
minecraft:suspicious_stew_effects.description: The effects applied when consuming this suspicious stew.

duration.title: Effect Duration
duration.description: The duration of the effect in ticks. Defaults to 160.

minecraft:tool.title: Tool Configuration
minecraft:tool.description: If set, this item is considered as a tool.

default_mining_speed.title: Default Mining Speed
default_mining_speed.description: The default mining speed of this tool, used if no rules override it. Defaults to 1.0.

damage_per_block.title: Damage Per Block
damage_per_block.description: The amount of durability to remove each time a block is broken with this tool. Must be a non-negative integer. Defaults to 1.

can_destroy_blocks_in_creative.title: Can Destroy Blocks in Creative
can_destroy_blocks_in_creative.description: Whether players can break blocks while holding this tool in Creative mode. Defaults to true.

rules.title: Tool Rules
rules.description: A list of rules for the blocks that this tool has a special behavior with. If a field is overridden by multiple matched rules, the one that comes first in the list is chosen.

blocks.title: Block Matcher
blocks.description: The blocks to match with. Can be a block ID or a block tag with a #, or a list of block IDs.

speed.title: Mining Speed
speed.description: If the blocks match, overrides the default mining speed. Optional.

correct_for_drops.title: Correct for Drops
correct_for_drops.description: If the blocks match, overrides whether or not this tool is considered correct to mine at its most efficient speed, and to drop items if the block's loot table requires it. If not set by any rules, defaults to false. Optional.

minecraft:tooltip_display.title: Tooltip Display Configuration
minecraft:tooltip_display.description: Allows the tooltips provided specifically by any given item component to be suppressed.

hide_tooltip.title: Hide Tooltip
hide_tooltip.description: If true, the item has no tooltip when hovered.

hidden_components.title: Hidden Components
hidden_components.description: The tooltips provided by any component in this list are hidden. If that component provides no tooltip, it has no effect.

items.title: Component Resource Location
items.description: The resource location of a component

minecraft:tooltip_style.title: Tooltip Style Resource Location
minecraft:tooltip_style.description: The resource location of the custom sprites for the tooltip background and frame which references textures /assets/<namespace>/textures/gui/sprites/tooltip/<id>_background and /assets/<namespace>/textures/gui/sprites/tooltip/<id>_frame.

minecraft:trim.title: Armor Trim
minecraft:trim.description: Contains the trim applied to this armor piece.

pattern.title: Trim Pattern
pattern.description: The ID of the trim pattern.

material.title: Trim Material
material.description: The ID of the trim material, which applies a color to the trim.

minecraft:unbreakable.title: Unbreakable Configuration
minecraft:unbreakable.description: If set, this item doesn't lose durability when used.

minecraft:use_cooldown.title: Use Cooldown Configuration
minecraft:use_cooldown.description: If present, this item applies a cooldown to all items of the same type when it has been used.

cooldown_group.title: Cooldown Group
cooldown_group.description: The unique resource location to identify this cooldown group. If present, the item is included in a cooldown group and no longer shares cooldowns with its base item type, but instead with any other items that are part of the same cooldown group. Optional.

minecraft:use_remainder.title: Use Remainder Configuration
minecraft:use_remainder.description: If present, replaces the item with a remainder item if its stack count has decreased after use.

minecraft:weapon.title: Weapon Configuration
minecraft:weapon.description: When present, the specified amount of damage can be done to the item with each attack. Additionally, the 'Item Used' statistic is incremented for each attack with the item.

item_damage_per_attack.title: Item Damage Per Attack
item_damage_per_attack.description: The amount to damage the item for each attack performed. Defaults to 1.

disable_blocking_for_seconds.title: Shield Disable Duration
disable_blocking_for_seconds.description: The amount of seconds that this item can disable a blocking shield on successful attack. If set to 0, this item cannot disable a blocking shield. Defaults to 0.

minecraft:writable_book_content.title: Writable Book Content
minecraft:writable_book_content.description: The contents of this book and quill.

pages.title: Book Pages
pages.description: A list of the pages in the book.

oneOf.title: Plain Text Page
oneOf.description: The plain text content of a page.

oneOf.title: Detailed Page
oneOf.description: A single page with optional filtering.

raw.title: Raw Text
raw.description: The plain text content of the page.

filtered.title: Filtered Text
filtered.description: The filtered text of the page. Optional. Shown only to players with chat filter enabled, instead of raw text.

minecraft:written_book_content.title: Written Book Content
minecraft:written_book_content.description: The contents and metadata of this written book.

pages.title: Book Pages
pages.description: A list of the pages in the book.

oneOf.title: Detailed Page
oneOf.description: A single page with optional filtering.

raw.title: Raw Text Component
raw.description: The text component representing the text content of the page. See Text component format.

filtered.title: Filtered Text Component
filtered.description: The Text component representing the filtered text of the page. Optional. Shown only to players with chat filter enabled, instead of raw text.

title.title: Book Title
title.description: The title of this written book.

filtered.title: Filtered Title
filtered.description: The filtered title. Optional. Shown only to players with chat filter enabled, instead of raw text.

author.title: Book Author
author.description: The author of this written book.

generation.title: Book Generation
generation.description: The number of times this written book has been copied. 0 = original, 1 = copy of original, 2 = copy of copy, 3 = tattered. Defaults to 0. If the value is greater than 1, the book cannot be copied.

resolved.title: Text Components Resolved
resolved.description: If true, the text components have already been resolved (such as entity selectors and scores). If false, they are resolved when this book is opened by a player for the first time. Defaults to false.

consumableEffect.title: Consume Effect
consumableEffect.description: A single consume effect with a specific behavior.

type.title: Effect Type
type.description: The type of consume effect. Must be one of: apply_effects, remove_effects, clear_all_effects, teleport_randomly, play_sound.

effects.title: Effects
effects.description: List of effect definitions or effect IDs, depending on effect type.

id.title: Effect ID
id.description: The ID of the effect to apply.

amplifier.title: Amplifier
amplifier.description: The amplifier value. Level I is 0. Defaults to 0.

duration.title: Duration
duration.description: Duration of the effect in ticks. -1 = infinite, 0/-2 or less = 1. Defaults to 1.

ambient.title: Ambient
ambient.description: Whether it's a beacon-style effect. Defaults to false.

show_particles.title: Show Particles
show_particles.description: Whether the effect shows particles. Defaults to true.

show_icon.title: Show Icon
show_icon.description: Whether the effect icon is shown. Defaults to true.

probability.title: Effect Probability
probability.description: Chance (0.0â€“1.0) that effects apply when consumed. Defaults to 1.0.

diameter.title: Teleport Diameter
diameter.description: Diameter of the teleport range if teleport_randomly. Defaults to 16.0.

sound.title: Play Sound Effect
sound.description: Sound played if effect is play_sound. Can be string or compound.

id.title: Sound ID
id.description: ID of the sound event to play.
